fields.name: Cadbury Dairy Milk
fields.description: Our classic bar of deliciously creamy Cadbury Dairy Milk milk chocolate, made with fresh milk. A mouthful of “mmmm” in every piece!

fields.name: Cadbury Dairy Milk Fruit & Nut
fields.description: A mouth-watering combination of crunchy almonds and delicious dried grapes, all engulfed in Cadbury Dairy Milk milk chocolate to make a chocolate bar like no other!

fields.name: Cadbury Dairy Milk Oreo
fields.description: Deliciously creamy Cadbury Dairy Milk milk chocolate, packed with soft vanilla flavour filling and crunchy Oreo pieces - snap off a bite of biscuity bliss!

fields.name: Cadbury Dairy Milk Chopped Nut
fields.description: Deliciously smooth Cadbury Dairy Milk milk chocolate, filled with hazelnuts - chopped for the perfect combination in every bite!

fields.name: Cadbury Dairy Milk Daim
fields.description: Deliciously creamy Cadbury Dairy Milk milk chocolate, scattered with golden chunks of Daim - snap off a piece for irresistible crunchiness and smoothness in every bite!
